summary.span: 類別的 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) Proxy。

span.span: The Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) proxy of a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 proxy類別或類別，衍生自。 is a proxy for a class, or a class derived from . 可讓[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]程式碼以設定常用屬性，將這些設定傳遞至基礎的檢視。 enables [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] code to set the commonly used properties, passing these settings to the underlying view. 已保留的實際檢視的屬性和保留來源集合的屬性。 has a property that holds the actual view and a property that holds the source collection. 您可以想像集合檢視的上方繫結來源集合，可讓您巡覽及顯示依據排序、 篩選和群組查詢，而不必管理基礎來源集合本身的所有集合的圖層。You can think of a collection view as the layer on top of the binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself. 如果來源集合實作介面，所引發的變更事件傳播至檢視。If the source collection implements the interface, the changes raised by the event are propagated to the views. 因為檢視不會變更基礎來源集合，每個來源集合可以有多個相關聯的檢視。Because views do not change the underlying source collections, each source collection can have multiple views associated with it. 例如，您可能有的集合`Task`物件。For example, you may have a collection of `Task` objects. 使用檢視時，您可以不同方式顯示相同資料。With the use of views, you can display that same data in different ways. 舉例來說，在頁面左方您可以顯示依優先順序排序的工作，右方顯示依區域分組的工作。For example, on the left side of your page you may want to show tasks sorted by priority, and on the right side, grouped by area. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)中的＜繫結至集合＞一節。For more information, see the Binding to Collections section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定所需的檢視型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the desired view type.

value.span: 所需的檢視型別。

span.span: The desired view type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這可以在您想要建立自訂檢視頂端的預設型別不同的特定類型的集合時使用。This can be used when you want to create a custom view on top of a collection of a specific type that is different from the default type. 這個屬性只能在初始化期間設定。This property may only be set during initialization. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *typeName**typeName* 名稱所包含的這個檢視。The name of the that is contained by this view. 請注意，使用[X:type 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md)指定中的型別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Note the use of the [x:Type Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md) to specify a type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會被轉送到任何集合檢視，建立從這個集合。This property is forwarded to any collection view created from this collection. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ietfLanguageTag**ietfLanguageTag* 字串，用來設定。A string used to set the . 此字串用來在內部呼叫。This string is used to internally call. .. 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱。For details on the string format, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IDisposable DeferRefresh() cil managed

summary.span: 進入延後循環，您可以用來合併變更到檢視，並且延遲自動重新整理。

span.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.

returns.span: 物件，可用來處置呼叫物件。

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的用法是建立`using`範圍使用這個方法，然後放在範圍內的 多個檢視變更呼叫。The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope. 延後循環結束之前，這會延遲自動重新整理。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Filter As FilterEventHandler

summary.span: 提供篩選邏輯。

span.span: Provides filtering logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視可以將篩選套用至集合。Views can apply a filter to a collection. 這表示，雖然項目可能存在於集合中，特定的檢視要示範的特定子集的完整集合。This means that although an item might exist in the collection, a particular view is intended to show only a certain subset of the full collection. 若要設定的事件處理常式，來提供篩選邏輯，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to set an event handler to provide filtering logic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to set an event handler for the event. 在此範例中，`listingDataView`的執行個體。In this example, `listingDataView` is an instance of . [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#10)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#10)] 下圖顯示的範例實作`ShowOnlyBargainsFilter`篩選事件處理常式。The following shows the implementation of the example `ShowOnlyBargainsFilter` filter event handler. 這個事件處理常式會使用屬性來篩選掉`AuctionItem`具有物件`CurrentPrice`$25 個或更高。This event handler uses the property to filter out `AuctionItem` objects that have a `CurrentPrice` of $25 or greater. [!code-csharp[DataBindingLab#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataBindingLab#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataBindingLab/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#5)] 完整的範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。For the complete example, see [Data Binding Demo](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView GetDefaultView(object source) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDefaultView (source As Object) As ICollectionView

span.span: An object reference to the binding source.

summary.span: 傳回指定來源的預設檢視。

span.span: Returns the default view for the given source.

returns.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件是指定來源集合的預設檢視。

span.span: Returns an object that is the default view for the given source collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此預設檢視永遠不會關聯任何物件。This default view is never affiliated with any objects. 所有集合都具有預設值。All collections have a default . WPF 一律繫結至檢視，而不是集合中。WPF always binds to a view rather than a collection. 如果您直接繫結至集合，WPF 實際上會繫結至該集合的預設檢視。If you bind directly to a collection, WPF actually binds to the default view for that collection. 此預設檢視會共用所有的繫結至集合中，這會導致所有直接繫結至集合共用排序、 篩選、 群組及目前的項目特性的一個預設檢視。This default view is shared by all bindings to the collection, which causes all direct bindings to the collection to share the sort, filter, group, and current item characteristics of the one default view. 或者，您可以在其中建立您的集合中的檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]或使用程式碼類別，並在您的控制項繫結至該檢視。Alternatively, you can create a view of your collection in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] or code using the class, and binding your control to that view. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 排序和群組資料使用 XAML 中的檢視](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。For an example, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md).
